query:
WITH inserted AS (
            INSERT INTO telegram_bot_chat_ids (
                id, lender_id, chat_id
            )
            VALUES (
                $1, $2, $3
            )
            ON CONFLICT (chat_id) DO UPDATE 
            SET 
                lender_id = EXCLUDED.lender_id
            RETURNING 
                lender_id, chat_id
        )
        SELECT 
            i.lender_id,
            i.chat_id,
            l.name as "lender_name!"
        FROM inserted i
        JOIN lenders l ON l.id = i.lender_id
